name: Constipation Simulator 2020
description:
Context:

This game is a submission for the 'So Bad It's Good' Jam.

Point of Game:

You are a poor man suffering with constipation. Simulate what it is like to have constipation in this experience.

Gameplay:

You can look around using the mouse and can press the escape key to quit. When  on the menu, you can press a button to play, if that's anything else interesting to add.

Other info:

Be sure to donate to me through the download link to support the further development of my sometimes-weird games, and check out my other games if interested as well. The music came from www.bensound.com and the 3d models used came from free3d.com
